column1: #text=I went grocery shopping late last night .
#text=I like going at night because it 's not so crowded .
#text=First I made a list of the things I needed then headed to the store .
#text=Another nice thing about shopping late is that you get to park right near the door , which makes things easier when you come out .
#text=Once I got inside , I grabbed a shopping cart and took out my list .
#text=There was nothing out of the ordinary on the list , so I started heading down the aisles just like I always do .
#text=I always keep track of the cost of everything I pick out on my tablet as I go so that I know if I can afford anything extra .
#text=The time a couple thing I needed were on sale , so I did have some extra money .
#text=I decided that I needed some cookies and headed over the the cookie aisle .
#text=I looked at the Oreos for a little while , then checked the other cookies .
#text=I decided on chocolate chip cookies this time , so I put the on top of the other things in my cart and went to the checkout lane .
#text=I paid and got everything bagged , then headed out to my car .
#text=I got everything in the trunk , put the cart away and headed home to put my groceries away and have some chocolate chip cookies .
